"Okay, Airbomber will teach you about some stuff first." Train Wreck said.
=

"Okay, we are on the planet Earth, we are with the Maximlas, and we are tr=
ying to destroy the Predacons and Alliance, but however, right now we are a=
t truce, so our enemies are the Newcomers right now." Airbomber said.

"Yea=
h, Airbomber got it right, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be successful in =
the Neo Beast Wars, you have to know the fine arts, come outside and let us=
 show you." Stranato said. The Radicons walked out the door, motioning for =
Infectra to come along...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealll=
izards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:09 AM
  S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectra looked at them all* Infectra: What=
's so horrid about this place? You must teach me, please. *Infectra sits up=
 and looks at them waiting for some tips*
    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29=
, 2000 11:17 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Train Wreck looks at =
her.

    "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like when we got out spark shipme=
nt from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out your spark and snuck it in, s=
omebody must have hated you alot, but don't worry, yuor safe with us now." =
Train Wreck said.

    "Be careful, I tried to kill a guy." Stranato said.
=

    "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomber said.

    "It seems you d=
on't know about the war, you were peaceful on Cybertron, so lets teach you =
what to do to stay alive on this horrid planet." Train Wreck said.

    "Ye=
ah, first of all, ya gotta drink this stuff!" Stronghold said to Infectra, =
taking a big gulp of beer.

    "Yeah, and you smoke these!" Blender said, =
smoking a cigar. Train Wreck walked up and slapped them both in the back of=
 the head.

    "I can help, I love to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks o=
ver and smokes a cigar, blowing some smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck =
comes up behind Arrow and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns around and Train W=
reck slaps him in the face.

    "Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they d=
on't know any better." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
      Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast W=
ars


      *The Bots optics open and she looks around* Infectra:...where a=
m I????.......the last thing I remember I was seeing my friedns go plunging=
 to the floor and then this large bot sends this claw out at me....but.....=
.that's all I remember..... *She says to particular bot*
        ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
        Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


        OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a new cha=
racter to be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anything like D=
razom.
         
        Train Wreck works on Drazom. He looks at all of th=
e sparks they had in storage.

        "Now how did this one get in here? T=
his spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

        "So how di=
d it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark=
, curious to find out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, wh=
ich was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks noth=
ing like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robo=
t to come to life...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From=
: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursd=
ay, June 29, 2000 10:21 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        =
  (OOC: I want to bring in a new character. I already have an idea..)
     =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:08 PM
=
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Stranato was confused=
 now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should have be=
en happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect, he froze to=
 death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job he hated. Stranato pi=
cked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wrecked ship, wh=
ich served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a table.

         =
   "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us." Stran=
ato said.

            "I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguishe=
d, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

            =
"I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.

            "It wasn't you =
who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wre=
ck said.

            "No, you don't understand, I tried to kill him, I'm n=
o better than the cold! I don't understand why I did something like that, m=
aybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He sighed.

            "Maybe I'm ju=
st a son of a--"

            "No, you are acting stupid now! Your murderer=
 curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and your logic circuits." =
Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

            "I hope your right." S=
tranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

            "We could always=
 put a new spark in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in =
the corner.

            "We could have used him, and instead we let him di=
e and didn't save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

   =
         OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark c=
ollection (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new=
 character with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the =
body and you can bring in a new character without having him or her look li=
ke Drazom at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body e=
ven, just pick something, please...
              ----- Original Message --=
--- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
              Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
              Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *The knife hit Drazom's back. He di=
dn't scream or anything. It was already snowing which made him even colder.=
 Mech fluid begins pouring out of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's h=
ead hits the ground. It wasn't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's =
spark fades out and he lies there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....M=
antella....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....=
he lived to die.....That was a queston that would never be answered*





 =
             (OOC: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died=
 from the lack of emch fluid and because of how cold it was)
              =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
            =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6=
:54 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                The Ra=
dicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and t=
hey seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

                "There's the guy I =
saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

                "I =
don't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up=
 behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen=
 from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Dr=
azom's back.

                Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their be=
er.

                "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.
=

                "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons wa=
tching Stranato...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
          From: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                  Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
                  =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  *Drazom slowly turns his he=
ad and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my st=
upidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen a=
s he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me=
........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of=
 his side and he falls back to the ground shivering from how cold it is get=
ting from the lack of mech fluid*
                    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
    =
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                    Train Wreck w=
alked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, no=
t seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock fo=
llowed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after th=
em as well.

                    "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm goin=
g to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

                    "Who cares about you?=
" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheele=
d out of the way.

                    "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR=
 Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

                    "WHAT!?" Strana=
to yelled.

                    "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be r=
epaired there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

   =
                 The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out s=
omething that none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved=
 to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

 =
                   "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

           =
         "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                    "Neve=
r mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and u=
shered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

              =
      Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

                    =
"Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyw=
ay." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

                =
    "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

            =
        Dracona didn't hear and landed next to the People's Group members. =
The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base =
through the secret passage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Tr=
ain Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

                    "Hey, Str=
anato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out=
 of the CR Chamber all healed up.

                    "Yeah, it's got lots=
 of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to =
play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. St=
ranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

            =
        "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa =
sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were=
 locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of bangi=
ng, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed=
 and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

                    "=
Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" =
Stronghold said.

                    "What are we going to do? Nothing to =
smoke!" Blender said.

                    "I have more needs than all of y=
ou idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yel=
led.

                    "How come we can't all get along! I don't like it=
 in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to =
kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

                    "You see? That'=
s why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid r=
ules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                    "Yeah, a=
nd nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber=
 said.

                    Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood u=
p again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to loo=
k in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in =
this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, a=
nd Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

                    "Sa=
y, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

  =
                  "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can jo=
in us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with=
 them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

                    P=
lintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret =
passgeway, taking a walk across a field...

-------------------------------=
---------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------
